trans-unit.source: Represents a subscription to a timer event.
trans-unit.target: 타이머 이벤트에 대 한 구독을 나타냅니다.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] TimerEventSubscription objects are added to the timer queue associated with a workflow instance in order to send a message to a specific <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> at a specified time.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > [!INCLUDE[DeprecatedContent](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)]TimerEventSubscription 개체를 특정 메시지를 보내기 위해 워크플로 인스턴스와 연결 된 타이머 큐에 추가 됩니다 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>지정된 된 시간에.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue>

trans-unit.source: When the time specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> is reached, the workflow runtime engine sends a message containing the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> to the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> specified by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>.
trans-unit.target: 여는 시간을 지정 하는 경우 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>도달 하면 워크플로 런타임 엔진을 포함 하는 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> 지정 된</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> 메시지를 보내는</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: The timer queue associated with a workflow instance is contained in the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>.
trans-unit.target: 워크플로 인스턴스와 연결 된 타이머 큐 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> 에 포함 된

trans-unit.source: You can examine <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> objects returned by <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> to determine which activities are waiting on a specific TimerEventSubscription.
trans-unit.target: 검사할 수 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo>에서 반환 된 개체 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=fullName>특정 TimerEventSubscription에서 대기 중인 활동을 확인 하려면.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowInstance.GetWorkflowQueueData%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueueInfo> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscriptionCollection.TimerCollectionProperty>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity> and the <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> both use timer event subscriptions to provide part of their functionality.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>및 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService>타이머 이벤트 구독을 사용 하 여 해당 기능의 일부를 제공 하는 둘 다.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.Hosting.SqlWorkflowPersistenceService> </xref:System.Workflow.Activities.DelayActivity>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> 클래스입니다.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class by using the specified <xref:System.Guid> of a workflow instance and the specified expiration <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> 는 지정 된 <xref:System.Guid>워크플로 인스턴스 및 지정 된 만료 <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Guid> 사용 하 여 클래스

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>|A string representation of the system-supplied <xref:System.Guid> for <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>|A system-supplied <xref:System.Guid>.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>|The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>|The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>에 대 한 시스템 제공 <xref:System.Guid>의 문자열 표현입니다. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>| 시스템 제공 <xref:System.Guid>. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>| 로 지정 된 워크플로 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Guid> `workflowInstanceId`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>| 로 지정 된 된 <xref:System.DateTime> `expiresAt`. | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>의 문자열 표현으로 초기화 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>이 생성자에 의해.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> </xref:System.Guid></xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>이 구독과 연결 된 워크플로 인스턴스의.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>의 시간 (UTC)에이 구독과 연결 된 타이머의 예상 만료 시간을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"></xref> class by using the specified subscription Id, the specified <xref:System.Guid> of a workflow instance, and the specified expiration <xref:System.DateTime>.
trans-unit.target: 새 인스턴스를 초기화는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription"> </xref> 지정된 된 구독 Id는 지정 된 <xref:System.Guid>워크플로 인스턴스 및 지정 된 만료 <xref:System.DateTime>.</xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Guid> 를 사용 하 여 클래스

trans-unit.source: The following table shows the initial property values for an instance of <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>.
trans-unit.target: 다음 표에서 <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription>안내 하십시오.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription> 인스턴스에 대 한 초기 속성 값을 보여 줍니다.

trans-unit.source: |Property|Value| |--------------|-----------| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>|A string representation of the <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>|The <xref:System.Guid> specified by `timerId`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>|The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance, specified by `workflowInstanceId`.| |<xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>|The <xref:System.DateTime> specified by `expiresAt`.| <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> is initialized to a string representation of `timerId` by this constructor.
trans-unit.target: | 속성 | 값 | |--------------|-----------| | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>| <xref:System.Guid>의 문자열 표현을 지정 된 `timerId`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A>| 로 지정 된 된 <xref:System.Guid> `timerId`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A>| 로 지정 된 워크플로 인스턴스의 <xref:System.Guid> `workflowInstanceId`. | | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A>| 로 지정 된 된 <xref:System.DateTime> `expiresAt`. | <xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>의 문자열 표현으로 초기화 `timerId` 이 생성자에 의해.</xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A> </xref:System.DateTime> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.ExpiresAt%2A> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.WorkflowInstanceId%2A> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.SubscriptionId%2A> </xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.Workflow.Runtime.TimerEventSubscription.QueueName%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> for this subscription.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>이 구독에 대 한.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Guid> of the workflow instance for which this subscription was created.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>이 구독이 만들어진 워크플로 인스턴스의.</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer for this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>세계시 (utc)에이 구독에 대 한 타이머의 예상 만료를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Gets the expected expiration time of the timer associated with this subscription.
trans-unit.target: 이 구독과 연결 된 타이머의 예상된 만료 시간을 가져옵니다.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.DateTime> that represents the time in Universal Coordinated Time (UTC) at which the timer associated with this subscription is expected to expire.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.DateTime>의 시간 (UTC)에이 구독과 연결 된 타이머의 예상 만료 시간을 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.DateTime>

trans-unit.source: Represents the name of the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"></xref> that the <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"></xref> sends a message to when the timer subscription expires.
trans-unit.target: 이름을 나타내는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowQueue"> </xref> 하는 <xref href="System.Workflow.Runtime.WorkflowRuntime"> </xref> 타이머 구독 만료 시기에 메시지를 보냅니다.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.IComparable> interface for a <xref:System.Guid> object.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.IComparable>에 대 한 인터페이스는 <xref:System.Guid>개체입니다.</xref:System.Guid> </xref:System.IComparable>

trans-unit.source: Unique identifier that represents a timer event
trans-unit.target: 타이머 이벤트를 나타내는 고유 식별자

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> representing the unique identifier for a timer event
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>타이머 이벤트에 대 한 고유 식별자를 나타내는</xref:System.Guid>

trans-unit.source: Identifier of the workflow associated with the timer subscription
trans-unit.target: 타이머 구독과 연결 된 워크플로의 식별자입니다.

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Guid> representing the unique identifier for the workflow associated with the timer subscription.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Guid>타이머 구독과 연결 된 워크플로의 고유 식별자를 나타내는입니다.</xref:System.Guid>
